1.content:
A new president has been elected! He's promising some serious changes. Decide what might happen when a president with some serious fetishes and magical edicts tackles the office of President of the Transformation Nation!

Let's choose a character....
1.title: Transformation nation

12.content:
You've been in college for two years now, you're a hard working 20 year old male. Your name is Mike, you're a bit on the skinny side, and it's a bit of a surprise you've got a cute girlfriend, her name is Rachel.

Your life is totally normal. For now.

You're cuddled up with Rachel on your couch watching TV when suddenly the new president appears on the screen.
12.title: You're a college aged male

The president speaks to the nation, promising change, "The young women of this nation are very important. Your role for this nation is one of utmost importance,"

The president pauses, looking very... Presidential...

"All women will be assigned to men of my religion, and our harem will grow. Anyone not of my religion will not be allowed a mate. You may join my religion but must prove your loyalty if you are to have a wife," He nods at the camera, the screen changes back to TV. You look over at your girlfriend, she's wearing a gray sweatsuit, and looks cute as hell.

You lean in to kiss her, "wow, our president is so getting impeached in a week," you chuckle as you reach over to kiss, but she pulls away, and gives you a weird look.

"Hey, whoa, what are you doing? You heard him right? It's my duty to drop out of college and become a wife of a rich politician!" She rubbed her legs together excitedly.

"You're kidding right?" You can't believe what she just said, you look up at the TV and notice the show is about a big Morman family with about 20 wives, most of them pregnant, all dressed in their simple dresses. They're taking care of their children and sewing aprons, stuff like that.

1213.content:
"There is a small but growing problem in this nation, and I intend to nip it in the bud," says the president. "And that problem is people preferring Internet pornography to actual human sexual contact. With this trend continuing, we estimate that our nation will have a negative birthrate within only five years -- and within ten years, the rate will be so low that even immigration will not be able make up for it. We will have negative population growth, which is unsustainable."

You and Rachel look at each other, confused. You can't believe this is what the new president is focusing on.

He continues, "However, I do have an initiative to alleviate the situation. The women of this nation will be transformed to meet, if not exceed, the fantastic visions of femininity and sexuality that are presented in porn."

"What?" says a disbelieving Rachel.

"I realize that this transformation will result in widespread societal change, particularly due to the fact that there will be a noticeable decrease in intelligence in women. To mitigate this, the change will happen in stages, to various groups of women -- so that, for example, women who are currently doctors can plan to wind up their practice and take an easier job by the time they are transformed. Of course, there will be government assistance available for all of this."

"What?!" exclaims Rachel, now sitting bolt upright and leaning forward.

"However, the first stage will happen immediately, and it will affect women of approximately college age, that is, 18 to 23. This will mean that all young women must leave college, due to their loss of intelligence -- that is, their college classes. Women will still be allowed to participate in cheerleading and whatever other athletics they will still be interested in, and of course providing an alternative to Internet porn for male students and any other interested men. Mitigation plans are currently being distributed to all colleges and universities."

"This can't be serious," Rachel says as she continues to stare at the screen. "This has gotta be 'SNL' or something." But it's not Saturday night -- it's early Thursday evening.

"Women currently in a trade school may stay enrolled," says the president, "but the roles they are being trained for may be altered. Mitigation plans for this are also being distributed."

"This has gotta be illegal." Rachel is trying to convince herself of something else now. "An unconstitutional executive order or something. I'm sure the other party is gonna shut this down ASAP. It doesn't make any sense. How can he even do this?"

Almost as if he heard her last question, the president says, "If you're wondering how this will be accomplished, it is through something that has been a secret up until right now..."
1213.title: Solving the Population Implosion

12131.content:
"...the National Guard is now deployed, to use Transformation Ray technology. This is something that has been developed over the past several decades, as an adaptation of previously classified alien artifacts that we have stored at Area 51."

"Whoa!" Now you sit bolt upright and lean forward.

"Jeez, Mike, that's what gets you interested?" Rachel asks.

The president continues. "Although we have the technology deployed in numerous locations nationwide, we may not affect every 18-to-23-year-old woman in the country at this time. NASA has a satellite in the launch preparation process that will carry a high-powered Transformation Ray that can affect the whole nation simultaneously. Therefore, any women 18 to 23 who are not transformed now will be transformed at the time of the next stage."

"So it might not happen here and now --" Rachel mutters. She's taking shallow breaths now.

"Or maybe the National Guard people will decide it's an illegal order and just not do it," you try to reassure her.

The president says, "The transformations will not occur instantaneously, but the effects should be noticeable quickly. I would strongly suggest that any woman 18 to 23 who is currently driving should pull over as soon as possible. Most transformed women will retain enough intelligence that they will still be able to operate a motor vehicle, but they may find the transformation itself somewhat distracting."

"Most will retain enough intelligence?" Rachel protests. "Where's my phone? People have gotta be talking about this on Facebook or Twitter or whatever." She feels around on the couch and finally finds it.

"I also want to note that the Transformation Ray technology will result in ongoing and permanent changes," says the president. "Any attempts to reverse the transformation -- for example, breast reduction surgery, or even hair dye or makeup remover -- will be unsuccessful."

"Since when do I follow so many men's rights advocates?" Rachel wails as she swipes up on the phone's screen.

"Let me see," you say, craning your neck to see what people are saying on her phone. Before you get a chance to look, she puts it down as the president continues.

"The Transformation Ray technology will be activated in moments. It does not matter if you are indoors or outdoors. If you see a blue flash, you will know that all 18-to-23-year-old women in the area will be transformed. And the activation occurs... now."

You and Rachel both turn your heads away from the TV to look out the nearest window.
12131.title: Transformation Ray Technology

choices: "Why does it look like YOU'RE changing?"
121311.content:
You'd kind of thought the blue flash might be bright, like lightning, but what you see is more of a dull glow that suddenly appears, lasts for a few seconds, and then disappears just as suddenly.

"Y-you think that was it?" asks Rachel, still looking out the window nervously.

"I guess," you say. You turn back to the TV, where the president is looking at something just off-camera.

He turns back toward the camera and you think you see a small smile come to the president's face. "I've gotten the signal that the Transformation Ray has been deployed successfully. Within minutes, 98% of women 18 to 23 will be transformed. Rest assured, they will all be 10s, and it will be amazing. Ah, I should probably also mention that their clothing will change as well, so that they will also dress in a feminine and sexual manner at all times."

"What?!" Rachel exclaims yet again. She's shaking a bit, so you reach to put your arms around her, but she shrugs you off. "Oh, my God, Mike," she says...
